title: Indian Omelette with Tomato & Pepper
method: Heat a large non-stick pan over medium-high heat.
Add oil; sauté onions/garlic 2–3 min until fragrant.
Add protein and cook 6–8 min until browned.
Add veg, spices, and liquids; simmer 8–12 min to thicken.
Season to taste and serve hot.
hydrationTip: If training today, add 300–600 ml water around this meal.
swaps: Swap protein for tofu/chicken as preferred.

title: Moroccan Noodle Bowl with Roasted Veg
method: Preheat grill (broiler) to high or oven to 210°C.
Brush ingredients with oil and season well.
Grill 3–5 min per side until charred and cooked through.
Rest 2–3 min; slice and serve.
hydrationTip: Pair with water or unsweetened tea.
swaps: Swap protein for tofu/chicken as preferred.

title: Austrian Goulash with Roasted Veg
method: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Prepare a lined baking tray or oven dish.
Toss main ingredients with oil, seasoning, and spices.
Bake for 18–25 min, turning once, until cooked through.
Rest 3–5 min before serving.
hydrationTip: If training today, add 300–600 ml water around this meal.
swaps: Swap protein for tofu/chicken as preferred.

title: Israeli Grain Bowl with Mushroom Mix
method: Warm a heavy pot over medium heat; add 1 tbsp oil.
Brown protein 4–6 min; remove to a plate.
Sauté aromatics 3–4 min; stir in spices 30 sec.
Return protein with tomatoes/stock; bring to a gentle boil.
Reduce to a simmer; cover and cook 25–35 min until tender.
hydrationTip: If training today, add 300–600 ml water around this meal.
swaps: Swap protein for tofu/chicken as preferred.
